GamepadHapticActuator.summary: The GamepadHapticActuator interface of the Gamepad API represents hardware in the controller designed to provide haptic feedback to the user (if available), most commonly vibration hardware.

remarks.para: This interface is accessible through the property.

GamepadHapticActuatorPlayEffect.summary: The playEffect() method of the interface causes the hardware to play a specific vibration effect.
GamepadHapticActuatorPlayEffect.returns: A promise that resolves with "complete" when the effect successfully completes, or "preempted" if the current effect is stopped or replaced by another effect.The promise may reject with the following exception types:

GamepadHapticActuatorEffects.summary: NOTE Experimental The effects read-only property of the interface returns an array of enumerated values representing the different haptic effects that the actuator supports.
GamepadHapticActuatorEffects.value:
An array representing the supported haptic effects. Possible included values are:
NOTEIf an effect is not listed that is known to be supported by the hardware, it may be that the browser does not support playing effects of that type.

GamepadHapticActuatorType.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The type read-only property of the interface returns an enumerated value representing the type of the haptic hardware.

remarks.para: This property is deprecated: use to detect effect support.

GamepadHapticActuatorType.value: An enumerated value representing the haptic hardware type. Currently available types are:

GamepadHapticActuatorPulse.summary: The pulse() method of the interface makes the hardware pulse at a certain intensity for a specified duration.
GamepadHapticActuatorPulse.returns: A promise that resolves with a value of true when the pulse has successfully completed.

GamepadHapticActuatorReset.summary: The reset() method of the interface stops the hardware from playing an active vibration effect.
GamepadHapticActuatorReset.returns: A promise that resolves with "complete" if the effect is successfully reset, or "preempted" if the effect was stopped or replaced by another effect.The promise may reject with the following exception types:
